0100111110001101 1101011110110000 1 -> sum: 0010011100111110, cout: 1
0000100111111001 1000001000010011 1 -> sum: 1000110000001101, cout: 0
0110110101001001 0001111110000010 0 -> sum: 1000110011001011, cout: 0
1011000100110100 1110101101001010 0 -> sum: 1001110001111110, cout: 1
0001010111101011 1000111100100001 1 -> sum: 1010010100001101, cout: 0
1000000101010111 1010111001011000 0 -> sum: 0010111110101111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
